name: Rocket Assault
description:
Rocket Assault
Rocket assault is single player racing/action game, that consists in completing short missions with an specific goal the fastest way possible.

Use boost to fly like a rocket and launch your rockets to blow up everything that comes in your way!How do I aim in the air?
There is a dedicated button to press in the air, and this will slow the rotation of the car, also the camera will face the front of the car, this allows to make precise movements to aim and shoot with ease, the ideal play is to align the car on the jump and make small adjustments in the air before you launch the rocket, this works really well !!How do the rockets work?
The rockets have a tracking system, that will detect any targets that are close enough, once it's locked it will try to adjust its trajectory and hit it, don't be fooled! you still have to aim but not exactly on target.Level Design
We want to make each mission feel unique, and different than the one before, that's why we are trying very hard to come up with new ideas, and concepts that may apply to the gameCombo systems
in some levels the boost will be gained by destroying targets, the faster you destroy targets more boost will be added, if you take any damage or you are too slow the combo breaks, this will make the level very fast paced and dynamic.Boss Battles
Imagine in front of you a huge ship that leaves bombs on the track, and shoots rockets at you! and to defeat it you have to shoot the weak points until you destroy it, is it a great idea or what??Aerial Levels
Some levels will be mostly by air, so you have to grab the floating boost, to keep going.Bomb Rescue
To complete these levels you'll have to find a bomb a take it to a safe area, when the bomb is on you, any small bump will detonate the bomb so be careful!
